attributes.agent_name: Motus Ford Airport Park Germiston Used Cars
attributes.description:
Finance can be arranged, Excludes administration, delivery and license registration fees, 160 point quality check, Very neat, Trade-ins accepted, Test drives welcome, Nationwide delivery.

Finance is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Please come and visit our Used Car Manager and our Business Manager, they will be able to arrange a Taylor made Deal structure to match your pocket over a lovely cup of coffee at our Bistro. Trade-ins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. First time to finance, our Finance and Insurance Manager will assist you step by step throughout your process. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us.
attributes.finance_estimate:
Estimated monthly payment is R 6 070.00 over 72 months with 10% deposit of R 34 490.00 at a rate of 12% (PRIME + 3%).

* Please note that these calculations are only estimates and must be confirmed with your finance provider.
attributes.title: 2022 Ford Ranger 2.2 TDCi Single-Cab

attributes.description: Motus Ford Kroonstad offers nationwide delivery to all of our valued customers as well as our very own Finance and Insurance Manager who is ready to help with finance at our dealership or over the phone for your CONVENIENCE in a matter of MINUTES with all 4 major banks. All of our vehicles come with a 160-point QUALITY Check meaning they check every part of the vehicle to make sure it is 101% Roadworthy as well as 101% PERFECT just for you! Please note that the price advertised excludes our Documentation, License and Delivery fees all at one standard price. Test Drives and Trade Ins are most certainly welcome.

attributes.title: 2020 Renault Sandero 900T Expression

attributes.description: New Renault Koleos broadens your outlook. A previously unseen alliance of power and refinement, its assertive design pushes the boundaries of what is expected and expresses itself with innovative style. Its confident stature inspires respect. An SUV with large shoulders and muscular side panels, its robust front end, broad tyres and large wheelbase give it the look of a partner that can rise to any challenge. Renault Koleos takes you further, whatever route or adventure you want to pursue. Renault Koleos is a bold step forward in automotive design and technology. With space that exceeds expectations and levels of comfort and finish that make every journey a pleasure.
